[code] Verzion is a Runescape private server as my partner and I have been working on. Me as a coder, I'm trying to make my players happy for my RSPS. Therefore, adding as many features into a Regular Player, so my players will not get bored while playing Verzion 718. My goal with this is to have a good RSPS experience. I hope that you will give me a chance by playing.[/code]
[Code] Squeal Of Fortune Player Owned House Sawmill Better Loyalty System Farming Hunter Perfect Glacors Custom Bosses Quest TAb Prestige Friendly Staff IPB Forums Auto Vote riendly Players.. Perfectly Working 25 skills. Awesome Bosses + Customs. Fully Working Bank tabs, Search Functions. Help Chats. Great Equipment Switching. Owners's that will listen to your suggestions.. Minigames... Working Squeal of Fortune Helpful Staff. Lots of bosses to kill New looks and old looks on items! Ancients, Curses, Working skill cape emotes An Awesome Home! Awesome Loyalty System! Many Custom Minigames.. Crystal Chest (Money)... Apply on forum for staff. Many ingame Ranks. item.title: ★ Verzion 718 - 'Economy Server' ★
item.dc:creator: @Engineer Engineer
item.description:
@Engineer wrote:

http://forum.entrinthy742.com
Download - https://www.dropbox.com/s/bv89sxulryp94m6/Verzion.jar

Verzion is a Runescape private server as my partner and I have been working on. Me as a coder, I'm trying to make my players happy for my RSPS. Therefore, adding as many features into a Regular Player, so my players will not get bored while playing Verzion 718. My goal with this is to have a good RSPS experience. I hope that you will give me a chance by playing.

Squeal Of Fortune Player Owned House Sawmill Better Loyalty System Farming Hunter Perfect Glacors Custom Bosses Quest TAb Prestige Friendly Staff IPB Forums Auto Vote riendly Players.. Perfectly Working 25 skills. Awesome Bosses + Customs. Fully Working Bank tabs, Search Functions. Help Chats. Great Equipment Switching. Owners's that will listen to your suggestions.. Minigames... Working Squeal of Fortune Helpful Staff. Lots of bosses to kill New looks and old looks on items! Ancients, Curses, Working skill cape emotes An Awesome Home! Awesome Loyalty System! Many Custom Minigames.. Crystal Chest (Money)... Apply on forum for staff. Many ingame Ranks. Strykewyrms Giantmole
